name: GlucoBuddy
0:
”Alexa, open gluco buddy”
”Alexa, ask gluco buddy for my summary”
”Alexa, ask gluco buddy for my daily report”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gluco buddy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill delivers a brief report of your blood sugar readings in the past 24 hrs. Please link your Dexcom account by tapping the Enable button. 

Your data privacy is of utmost concern to us. Unlike other solutions GlucoBuddy does not require you to sign up for a separate GlucoBuddy account or setup GlucoBuddy as a Dexcom follower of your CGM data. We do not store or process your data and only request it from Dexcom, when required.
